scripts.integration:all: pnpm run integration:unchanged && pnpm run integration:degradation
scripts.integration:npm: perftool -o test-result/old.json --logLevel=verbose && SLOW=1 perftool -o test-result/new.json --logLevel=verbose && npm run integration:compare test-result/new.json test-result/old.json -o test-result/degradation.json -V test-result/degradation.html
scripts.integration:degradation: perftool -o test-result/degradation_old.json --logLevel=verbose && SLOW=1 perftool -o test-result/degradation_new.json --logLevel=verbose && pnpm run integration:compare test-result/degradation_new.json test-result/degradation_old.json -o test-result/degradation.json -V test-result/degradation.html
scripts.integration:unchanged: perftool -o test-result/unchanged_old.json --logLevel=verbose && perftool -o test-result/unchanged_new.json --logLevel=verbose && pnpm run integration:compare test-result/unchanged_new.json test-result/unchanged_old.json -o test-result/unchanged.json -V test-result/unchanged.html
scripts.integration:collaborative:unchanged: ./touch.mjs && pnpm run integration:collaborative -o test-result/unchanged_new.json --baselineOutputPath test-result/unchanged_old.json --compareOutputPath test-result/unchanged.json --visualReportPath test-result/unchanged.html
scripts.integration:collaborative:degradation: ./slowdown.mjs && pnpm run integration:collaborative -o test-result/degradation_new.json --baselineOutputPath test-result/degradation_old.json --compareOutputPath test-result/degradation.json --visualReportPath test-result/degradation.html
